title: Taxation of Cross-Border Commercial Transactions II
description:
This course is the second installment on the taxation of cross-border commercial transactions. The first installment, Taxation of Cross-Border Commercial Transactions I, is a pre-requisite. This course will interest those who want to practise tax law and/or those who took the first installment and enjoyed it. 

Topics covered: 
- The OECD Model Double Tax Treaty including the Multilateral Instrument (in-depth)
- Anti-avoidance rules and tax planning
- Accounting for Tax Consequences
- The Impact of Bilateral Investment Treaties on International Tax
- Tax Theory
prerequisite:
NUS Compulsory Core Law Curriculum or equivalent.
Taxation of Cross-Border Commercial Transactions I (LL4342V/LL5342V/LL6342V/LLJ5342V)
preclusion: LL4455V/LL5455V/LL6455V/LLJ5455V Taxation of Cross-Border Commercial Transactions II
